resources.string: Tap Here or Song Title for Details

Set Phasers to Retro by Hipster Moon is a commentary on the struggles faced by individuals feeling like they were born into the wrong time period. It is reflective of their later work using high pitched voices and general melancholy.

Before We Were Cool by Hipster Moon is a classic love song of hipsters who found eachother. Then after finding eachother and their relationship becoming too mainstream, problems ensue. It is a lament of the times when the relationship itself was as underground as the coffee that the hipsters drink
Wub Wub Wuuub by Trash Compactor is a forty minute loop of sirens and other sounds of metals being slammed into eachother. A young EDM band tries to find footing in the scene.

Hyper Melt Face by Decipticonipher is a trancey remix of the classic Hyper Face Melt where the entire song is simply played backwards at double speed and triple the bass. Close your eyes and sink into the couch with this song.

Drum Soulo by Drum Solo is the self-titled magnum opus of Drum Solo. The culmination of a thirty year career in thirty different rock and roll bands fueled the fire of this piece. Considered to be the auto-biography of all drummers, this five minute ear pounder will take you back to you.
